database

Class CourseDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.CourseDB

  • public class CourseDB
extends java.lang.Object
    This class hold all the Courses.

      void addCourse(Course course)
      This method adds a new course into the Course database.

      Check a course code has already been registered in the course database.
      boolean checkLessonExists(int lessonID) 
      Course getCourse(java.lang.String courseCode)
      Get the course whose course code corresponds to the requested course code.
      java.util.ArrayList<Course> getCourseAl()
      This method gets all Courses stored in the Course database in the form of an ArrayList.
      void printCourseList()
      Print the list of all courses in the course database.
      void printCourseListWithCoordinator()
      Print the list of all courses in the course database, together with the coordinator of the course.

      • checkCourseCodeExists

        public boolean checkCourseCodeExists(java.lang.String courseCode)
        Check a course code has already been registered in the course database.
        Parameters:
        courseCode - The course code of the course.
        Returns:
        Boolean whether the course code has already been registered in the course database.

      • checkLessonExists

        public boolean checkLessonExists(int lessonID)
        Parameters:
        lessonID - The ID of the lesson.
        Returns:
        Boolean whether the lesson exists in any one of the courses in the course database.

        Returns:
